title: Apply uploaded background images to Pages 1–3 and enable uploaded background music

requirements.text:
Replace the app’s three page background assets with the user-uploaded images by copying/renaming them into the expected static asset filenames so they render as the Page 1/2/3 full-screen letterboxed backgrounds.

Asset mapping to apply:
- Page 1 background: InsMix_20260209_211147926.jpg -> frontend/public/assets/generated/bg-page-1.dim_1920x1080.png
- Page 2 background (floral dress collage): InsMix_20260209_231320300.jpg -> frontend/public/assets/generated/bg-page-2.dim_1920x1080.png
- Page 3 background: InsMix_20260209_231554807.jpg -> frontend/public/assets/generated/bg-page-3.dim_1920x1080.png

Keep the existing background rendering rules (contain/letterbox, centered, no-repeat, with black translucent overlay) unchanged.

quotes: Build add all 3 image's in page 1,2 and 3 and audio file in background music

acceptanceCriteria: When visiting route / (Page 1), the background image displayed is the one from InsMix_20260209_211147926.jpg, shown in contain/letterbox mode (not cropped) with the existing black overlay.
When navigating to /proposal (Page 2), the background image displayed is the floral dress collage (InsMix_20260209_231320300.jpg) in contain/letterbox mode with the existing black overlay.
When navigating to /final (Page 3), the background image displayed is InsMix_20260209_231554807.jpg in contain/letterbox mode with the existing black overlay.
No code changes are required to swap these three backgrounds in the future beyond replacing the three files at frontend/public/assets/generated/ with the exact same filenames.

requirements.text: Install the user-uploaded audio file as the site’s background music by placing it at frontend/public/assets/generated/background-music.mp3 (keeping that exact filename), so it attempts to autoplay on site visit, loops continuously, has no visible controls, and continues playing uninterrupted across navigation between pages.

quotes: Build add all 3 image's in page 1,2 and 3 and audio file in background music

acceptanceCriteria: On initial site visit, the app attempts to start playing background music immediately; if the browser blocks autoplay, the first user interaction (click/tap) starts playback.
The background music loops continuously and has no visible audio player controls.
Music continues playing while navigating from Page 1 -> Page 2 -> Page 3 without restarting due to route changes.
Replacing frontend/public/assets/generated/background-music.mp3 with a different MP3 changes the music without any code changes.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any paths listed in frontend.immutablePaths in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep the existing per-page background rendering behavior: background-size: contain (never cropped), centered, no-repeat, with a black translucent overlay behind text/UI.
Keep the existing background music behavior: hidden audio, autoplay attempt + interaction fallback, loop, and persistence across navigation.
nonGoals: Do not change the page text content, typography system, colors, animations, or layout beyond what is necessary to apply the provided assets.
Do not add new routes or flows (e.g., the Valentine “Enter the Website” screen) as part of this request unless explicitly re-confirmed by the user in a new message.
